description.message: Chromium extension designed to change the tone of websites.

onHelp.message: Activate or deactivate the overlay for this website.

onDisabledHelp.message: Unfortunately, due to browser limitations, this website cannot have an overlay.

globalHelp.message: Use global settings that apply to all websites with this option enabled.

opacityHelp.message: Adjust the intensity of the screen overlay. Use the selector above to change the blend mode.

resetWebsiteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset the settings for this website?

resetAllConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset the settings for all websites?
